channel.description: We are currently evaluating the channel list and we currently don't feature all channels we had on Slack.

music.description: At the moment we offer the users following commands:

fields.name: `-play` songName or url
fields.value: Loads the specified track or playlist and adds it to the queue. If you would like to choose from the results, use -search [search query] instead.

fields.name: `-queue`
fields.value: Displays the tracks currently in the queue.

fields.name: `-lyrics`
fields.value: Displays the lyrics for the current track. If this cannot find your track, you may find better results by manually searching for it with -lyrics [input].

fields.name: `-song`
fields.value: Displays info about the playing track.
